bm_armor_level_8_desc:
Lifa Vest

Medium-heavy-weight armor

It shines by its exclusive regenerative properties
bm_armor_level_9_desc:
Lightweight Tactical Vest

Medium-weight but quite protective

A lightweight version of the CTV than has a tendancy to deflect bullets
bm_armor_level_10_desc:
Thin Vest

Very light, but no defense

The Thin Vest allows its user to move very quickly and dodge bullet
bm_armor_level_11_desc:
EOD Suit

Very heavy but durable armor

The EOD Suit is a suit made to endure explosions
bm_armor_level_12_desc:
Custom Armor

A hand-made armor

Can be ver yefficient or completely useless, depends on how the creator made it
bm_menu_skill_locked_level_11: Requires the Bomb Disposal Expert skill
menu_st_spec_armor_drainer_desc:
The armor drainer allows the shooter to increases its armor pool by leading headshots.

Note: when leading a headshot, a cooldown starts in which headshots don't increase the bonus.
armor_overhaul_options_gui_health_help: Shows HP value on top of health circle
armor_overhaul_options_gui_armor_help: Shows AP value on top of armor circle
crew_bonuses_help: Allows you to boost crew members using ArmorOverhaul Evolution. Does not apply to yourself
description_mechanics_help: Explanation of all mechanics of the game
description_new_help: Mechanics introduced or altered by ArmorOverhaul
description_new_armor_regen_desc:
When you are hit, you have to wait some time before your armor starts regenerating.
When this delay has passed, instead of instanlty regenerating, your armor
progressively regenerates, the rate depending on the armor.
If you are suppressed while your armor is regenerating, its regeneration rate is set at 0, but progressively recovers for 10 seconds (can be lowered by armor regeneration skills), as long as you are not suppressed again.
description_new_bullet_deflection_desc:
When an enemy shoots at you, you have a chance to nullify the bullet.
The odds depend on your armor (the tougher the better) and on the damage of the
bullet (the higher, the fewer the chances).
If you deflect the projectile, you proc the damage cooldown, like dodge does.
In blackmarket, interpret the stats as follow:
Deflection chance up to [deflect min value] (if damage <= [deflect min dmg]) and down to [deflect max value] (if damage > [deflect max dmg])
description_new_hdr_desc:
When you are hit while your armor is down (or when you are hit by a too strong sniper round), your armor can reduce health loss.
It depends on the armor (the tougher the better) and on the damage received (the higher the better).
In blackmarket, interpret the stats as follow:
Health damage reduction down to [HDR min value] (if damage <= [HDR min dmg]) and up to [HDR max value] (if damage > [HDR max dmg])
description_new_armor_ammo_desc:
Some armors alter your ammo pool.
Thin Suit lowers it by 20%, whereas some others increase it (Flak Jacket -> 35%; Lightweight Tactical Vest -> 40%).
description_new_edr_desc: If you are hit by an explosion, damage can be lowered by the armor, the tougher the higher reduction.
description_new_health_armor_desc:
Some armors alter your health pool. They are a restricted number though.
Lifa Vest increases your health pool by 100 HP, EOD Suit by 40 with Bomb Disposal Expert aced.
description_new_health_regen_desc:
Each tick (the briefiest part of time), depending on your armor, you might regenerate a bit of your health.
On normal difficulty, each armor (except Two-piece suit and Thin suit) grants you a tiny health regeneration per second.
Otherwise, only Lifa Vest grants health regeneration (1 HP per second with Curaga basic, 3 with Curaga aced).
description_new_jump_armor_desc:
The tougher your armor, the lower your jump will go.
With this in mind, the jump cooldown has been reduced to 0.05s.
description_new_bleeding_desc:
When you take health damage, you have a chance to start bleeding.
The odds and bleed rate depend on health loss, with a maximum of 50% chance to bleed and a rate of 50 HP per second.
The bleeding rate decreases when your armor is up. The debleeding rate varies accordingly to your armor and its current armor / max armor ratio.
Note that you cannot go into bleedout due to bleeding, and bleeding can be stopped by using a medic bag.
description_new_difficulty_desc:
Your armor stats are not static. They may depend on the difficulty.
There is a list of the stats affected by difficulty and their ratio (from normal to deathwish):
Armor (1, 1.1, 1.35, 1.75, 2.5)*
Health Damage Reduction (0.4, 0.5, 0.6, 0.8, 1)
Bullet Deflection (0.4, 0.5, 0.6, 0.8, 1)
Armor Regeneration (0.7, 0.8, 0.875, 0.95, 1)
Note that when in main menu, armor stats are those of your last difficulty played in the session (normal if no mission has been played).

*: Two-piece Suit has 20 AP on Overkill and below and 30 on DeathWish.
description_new_armor_reduction_desc:
When your armor breaks, your armor loses 1% of its base max armor, with a minimum of 50% remaining max armor.
To compensate for this loss, you are granted a 0.2% speed bonus each time it breaks (with a maximum of 10% bonus).
description_new_armor_drainer_desc:
A new perk deck has been introduced: Armor drainer.
When you deal a headshot, you are granted some bonus max armor. It has a 3.5 seconds cooldwon.
This bonus is lost when your armor breaks.
menu_stockholm_syndrome_desc:
BASIC:
Unlocks the Lifa Vest.
This vest nets you a ##100## HP bonus on normal difficulty (up to ##250## on DW) and a HP regen of ##1## per second.

ACE:
Improves your Lifa Vest, which now regenerates ##3## HP per second.
menu_tough_guy_desc:
BASIC:
Unlock the Improved Combined Tactical Vest.

ACE:
You can now shoot while running.
You can now melee shields to make them stumble.
menu_juggernaut_desc:
BASIC:
Unlocks the EOD Suit.

ACE:
Improves your EOD Suit, lowering explosion dmaage to ##10%##, increasing maximum HP by ##40## on normal (up to ##100## on DW), movement speed by ##6## and stamina by ##200%##.

Note: EOD Suit is unaffected by Blending In. When your EOD Suit is under suppression effect, it cannot regenerate more than ##75%## of its maximum regeneration rate.
menu_sentry_targeting_package_desc:
BASIC:
Unlocks the LightWeight Tactical Vest.

ACE:
Improves your Lightweight Tactical Vest, decreasing armor regeneration delay by ##20%##, increasing armor regeneraton rate by ##10## per second and deflection chance by ##10%##.
menu_sentry_2_0_desc:
BASIC:
You can now reload your sentry gun with your own ammo.
Your sentry gun's accuracy is increased by ##100%##.

ACE:
Your sentry gun receives a protective shield.
Your sentry gun's rotational speed is increased by ##150%##.
Your sentry gun contains ##50%## more ammo.
menu_moving_target_desc:
BASIC:
You can now run while strafing.
Unlocks the Thin Vest.

ACE:
You can now run in any direction.
Your Thin Vest's dodge value is increased by ##15%##
menu_deck_armor_drainer_1_desc: You hain ##1## maximum armor per headshot, with a maximum of ##0.5## per headshot.
menu_deck_armor_drainer_3_desc: You hain ##2## maximum armor per headshot, with a maximum of ##1## per headshot.
menu_deck_armor_drainer_5_desc: You hain ##3## maximum armor per headshot, with a maximum of ##2## per headshot.
menu_deck_armor_drainer_7_desc: You hain ##4## maximum armor per headshot, with a maximum of ##3.5## per headshot.
menu_deck_armor_drainer_9_desc: You hain ##5## maximum armor per headshot, with a maximum of ##5## per headshot.
